apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss emoji between two people with no discernible skin tone and dark skin tone conveys tender affection through soft, rounded figures leaning in for a gentle embrace. The subtle blush on their cheeks and the subtle glossy sheen, characteristic of Apple's 3D design, add a touch of warmth and intimacy. This emoji on Apple devices represents romantic connection, love, and affectionate gestures between partners, celebrating diverse relationships.
